hair dryer.title: POLITUN Hair Dryer Professional - 5000 Watts, Fast Drying, Salon Smooth, Powerful Motor, 3 Temperature Settings, 2 Speeds, Detachable Air Concentrator, Overheat Protection, PT-V12
